Хорошая кооперативная игра, с другом или друзьями самое то. Отличная физика, очень отличная физика, даже  многие нынешние игры могут позавидовать. Много карт, много классов зомби, много видов оружия, так что эта игра долго не надоест! Пока, что в Стиме наиграно только 5 часов, но большинство часов (примерно так 200-300) я играл через Гарену, так что с уверенностью рекомендую эту игру, если вам с друзьями захотелось поистреблять всякую нечесть - эта игра идеально подходит.

Buon gioco on-line in prima persona che però inizia ad evidenziare una certa vecchiaia nell'aspetto e nella giocabilità rispetto a molti altri giochi multiplayer. Bisogna comabattere contro orde di zombie e altre amenità varie in piccole ma efficaci locations. Ricorda vagamente Left for Dead il quale di per sé è già molto superiore almeno come giocabilità e coinvolgimento. Buono per qualche ora scaccia... zombie, ehm, pensieri.

Killing Floor-отличный зомби шутер, без всяких выкрутасов. Ваша цель в игре просто отстреливать зомби. В игре полно оружия, что делает игру чуточку разнообразнее, система классов и много, много ЗОМБИ!  Что еще нужно для счастья?

Killing Floor is the archetype of coopzombiesplatters: no objectives, no storyline, just three interactive pieces: you, your weapons and zombies. And all three are made very well indeed. even more impåressive, the amount of content via user made maps and mods is impressive to say the least.

yes, main menu interface and server listing are horrendous relics of red orchestra 1, but gameplay is solid and outlives most its peers even in 2014.
One of the few games that is made with soul and love. Moreover, with a unique approach to what is happening in this story)

I cannot stress how good this game is, sure it has it's glitches and kinks but over all it is an amazing game. the weapons and there variety, the classes (that acctualy do something), the charecters (they give away free ones too!), don't forget the achievements! now down to the acctual gameplay it has amazing multiplayer with hours upon hours of custome comunity made content it blows my mind. the single player is now my favourite because it is a mild game even on easy mode, which is good!
if you are looking for a good fps Killing floor has you covered and with the soon to be addition of killing floor 2 the hype is real.

This game has such potential. However, the horde based gameplay gets old after several rounds, espically considering only a few maps are not total clustefucks to play on. The Grind is boring and unnecessary, and draws away from the skill ceiling of the game, which is actually very high. However, the real problem is the redonkulus DLC packs, which compleatly turns me off of the game. Would not reccomend
Good game. Lots of fun. Good buy when on sale. 8/10

If you like horror games and survival games well gtfo of that Black Ops Zombie server and get on Killing Floor! A game that blends freaky wtf enemies with online multiplayer so you can expierence fear...TOGETHER! A nice touch is how rewarding leveling up your perks can be. Instead of unlocking stuff you can see health further, do more damage, and/or spawn with extra items. A true masterpiece of an FPS.

Simple Co-Op Game? $9.99 Dollars.

Simple Zombie/Mutant Monster game? $19.99 Dollars.

Huge arsenal of guns, rockets, and explosives game? $59.99 Dollars (I'm looking at you CoD.)

Getting terrified with your teammates while mutants feast on your innards? Priceless. 

There are somethings money can't buy, but for a cool Co-Op zombie shoot'em up game, theres Killing Floor.

Alright, no bullshit here. This game here, Killing Floor, is a great game. Sure it may seem repetitive, but if you're with friends and you up the difficulty, it's a great game that'll kill hours. My girlfriend hates fps games (Freakin Casual), but she's furious ( I do mean furious) when I play without her, and she's a calm, cute, sweet chick. I have been playing for more than 2 years and there is no game besides Super Mario Bros. and Super Mario Bros. 3 that I have played for that long. I often play on offline mode so she doesn't find out ( Hopefully she doesn't read this review). If you like Heavy Metal blasting as you blow up heads in slow motion and a touch of horror in it, come right in. Plus a workshop community! Get it or don't get, but I'm really stingy with games and this game is fantastic. DLC is b**** though.

I started playing KF 1.0 back when it was still a UT2K4 Mod, and every other version that came out since then.
When I heard that a standalone game would be made, I was amazed, and after watching some gameplay vids confirming that this was indeed the same KF I loved and cherished, got around to buy it.

Now, originally, this game was great. It had the same lore and backstory as the original mod, but much more refined graphics.
But over time, things went sour...
Suddenly, it wasn't about lone survivors and London's police forces fighting to hold back the hordes and halt Horzine's machinations. It was about weird dudes in steampunk outfits, elves and santa clauses and hillbillies. About steampunk weapons, robots, gold plated weapons, TRON guns and DLC for everything.

I would understand DLC skins for existing weapons (like the aforementioned gold skins). Eye candy for the people who think they need it, but without any gameplay difference.

But then there are weapon pack DLCs that bring in completely new weapons. Didn't buy it? Sucks to be you then. You don't get to play with the fancy toys.

I don't recommend this game if you like Killing Floor for what it originally was. If you are just looking for a mindless ZED killing game (no they are not even real Zombies here) that charges you for everything extra, then sink your money into this.

By the by, Masterson is actually a badass mofo with tattooed forearms and a black beret. Not some ugly, shitfaced dude with a stupid helmet.

Sad this game was once somthing awsome 6 player zombie slaughter of fun. Then came the disgusting over priced character packs for 1 new player 5$ a pop just because it has a new voice actor. But wait they went farther with a gold wepons skin pack that says hey look at me these guns have no diffrent stats from your's but I can afford this pack for 5$ and you cant also the wepons appear in your wepon store even if you dont own it and make it harder to find the wepon you want in time. Now if you have managed to read all of this and think huh they cant mess up the game more your wrong. Before the dumb pay to win update you max level for a class was 5 took for ever to reach I might add they then decided to raise it to 10 when I stoped playing. The last nail in the coffen for me was they even made it stupid easy and require no skill to be a medic you can run up to players and heal them with a needle ps thats normal and awsome. But now you can say well fawk dat scheit mate gg and lob healing grenades at your team that damage the undead. Moral of the story here is money ruins a good game just wait for Killing Floor 2 and prey its better than this.

Like zombies? Have some friends? Grab a gun and take out waves upon waves of zombies, as your only objective is to survive. The catch that makes it different from most other zombie shooters? You have classes and perks, a variety of means of destruction,  and the ability to make fortifications of the doors still on their hinges. Use this to face off against hordes of differing  zombies until you can finally face the big bad Patriach and see which is the superior species.
